item.title: Syrian boy is Germany's youngest national chess player
item.description: Germany's youngest national chess player is an 11-year-old Syrian boy who came to the country as a refugee.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Germany, Ukrainian, refugee, youngest national chess player
item.media:title: Syrian boy is Germany's youngest national chess player
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,Germany, Ukrainian, refugee, youngest national chess player

item.title: Former Ukrainian mufti now works for the war effort
item.description: DW’s Aya Ibrahim traveled to a mosque near Ukraine's eastern front line. There, she met a former Muslim spiritual leader who now works with soldiers fighting for Ukraine.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Ukraine, mufti, helping soldiers, Bakhmut
item.media:title: Former Ukrainian mufti now works for the war effort
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,Ukraine, mufti, helping soldiers, Bakhmut

item.title: AI-generated image wins World Photography Awards – contestant refuses prize!
item.description: Photographer Boris Eldagsen entered an image, generated by DALL-E 2, into the contest. He turned down the prize, because the image wasn’t a real photo. His aim: Discussion about the difference between photography and generative AI.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, AritificiaI Intelligence, World Photography Awards, Boris Eldagsen, DALL-E, photography, generative AI
item.media:title: AI-generated image wins World Photography Awards – contestant refuses prize!
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,AritificiaI Intelligence, World Photography Awards, Boris Eldagsen, DALL-E, photography, generative AI

item.title: Germany quits nuclear power
item.description: Germany recently shut down its last three nuclear power plants as part of a long-planned transition toward renewable energy.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Germany, nuclear power, nuclear power plants, renewable energy
item.media:title: Germany quits nuclear power
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,Germany, nuclear power, nuclear power plants, renewable energy

item.title: Flee or stay put? Ukrainian civilians weigh up the risks
item.description: Every day in the front-line cities of eastern Ukraine is a gamble. A decision to leave your shelter to get food could be your last. Yet there are people who are staying, and their reasons are complex, though some in this report have since been brought to safety by the "White Angels" police team
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Ukraine war, evacuation, civilians, Avdiivka, Chasiv Yar, front line
item.media:title: Flee or stay put? Ukrainian civilians weigh up the risks
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,Ukraine war, evacuation, civilians, Avdiivka, Chasiv Yar, front line

item.title: Does Angela Merkel deserve this award?
item.description: Former Chancellor Angela Merkel received Germany's highest Order of Merit today. But not everyone thinks she should have gotten it.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Angela Merkel, Germany, Order of Merit, former chancellor
item.media:title: Does Angela Merkel deserve this award?
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,Angela Merkel, Germany, Order of Merit, former chancellor

item.title: Ukraine: Teenage soldier adjusts to life after losing a leg on the frontline
item.description: Ruslana Danilkina was only 18 when she volunteered for the Ukrainian army. She was wounded on the battlefield and lost her leg. She tells us she had to learn to accept her new self.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Ukraine, Russia, war, female soldier, girl, 18 years old, amputated leg
item.media:title: Ukraine: Teenage soldier adjusts to life after losing a leg on the frontline
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,Ukraine, Russia, war, female soldier, girl, 18 years old, amputated leg

item.title: How this t-shirt gets delivered to you
item.description: Sea shipping is soooo CHEAP that we completely overuse it.

item.media:title: How this t-shirt gets delivered to you

item.title: Dark secrets of Lake Mead
item.description: Lake Mead used to be America’s biggest reservoir. But it has shrunk massively in recent years, revealing some scary discoveries at the bottom of the lake.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, US, Lake Mead, America, water reservoir, climate change, Las Vegas, scary discoveries
item.media:title: Dark secrets of Lake Mead
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,US, Lake Mead, America, water reservoir, climate change, Las Vegas, scary discoveries

item.title: Ukrainian refugees in US experience abuse from sponsors
item.description: DW met with a Ukrainian refugee living in California who says her young daughter was assaulted by their sponsor.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Urkaine, United States, Russia, war, refugees, abuse
item.media:title: Ukrainian refugees in US experience abuse from sponsors
